metadata.title: CVE-2019-18928 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Cyrus IMAP 2.5.x before 2.5.14 and 3.x before 3.0.12 allows privilegeescalation because an HTTP request may be interpreted in the authenticationcontext of an unrelated previous request that arrived over the sameconnection.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
